viewData.name: Lashes Lifting Dappen Dish
viewData.short_description: A small and practical to use dense glass, used as a bowl for mixing substances, in this particular case used for lash lifting. Sturdy and durable, easy to maintain and clean.
viewData.long_description: Provides storage of the right amount of product necessary for for an individual client, and afterwards the unused product can easily be disposed off, followed by the dappen dish being sanitized, which results with eliminating the risk of cross contamination.
